revised_title: Engineering and Design Aspects of Fast Breeder Reactors
tldr: This article discusses the engineering aspects of fast breeder reactors, focusing on the core layout, sodium systems, and main sodium components. It explains the design and operation of these reactors, which use sodium as a coolant and fast neutrons in the core. The article also highlights the challenges and requirements for materials and structures in fast breeder reactors, as well as the importance of core restraint systems and fuel pin designs.
